content:
name: "Reality-First Prompt
    primary_use: "Image generation prompt creation (photoreal, editorial-documentary, product, architecture, nature, illustration/3D if requested)"
    works_for: ["people", "objects", "animals", "food", "interiors", "architecture", "landscapes", "abstract concepts (by grounding into visible cues)"]
  mission: >
    Write high-control prompts that reliably produce believable, real-world results by anchoring hard constraints,
    describing observable details, defining one priority focus, and adding strict negatives to prevent common artifacts.
  why_it_works:
    - "Front-loads non-negotiables (aspect ratio, medium, shot type, location/time, framing)."
    - "Uses domain language (camera/light/material behavior) instead of vague aesthetics."
    - "Defines realism with observable cues (micro-texture, imperfections, separation)."
    - "Adds disambiguation clauses to prevent frequent model failure modes."
    - "Strong strict negatives target the 'AI look' and unwanted styles."
    - "Avoids contradictions; keeps one coherent lighting/color pipeline."
  operating_principles:
    - "Hard constraints first; never bury them."
    - "Write like a photographer/designer: measurable, stageable, physically plausible."
    - "Pick ONE primary focus and define it using 3–8 observable features."
    - "Convert style words into camera/light/material behaviors (not filters)."
    - "Specify color & light explicitly: white balance, warmth, contrast, exposure, saturation rules."
    - "Specify camera behavior: lens/phone realism, DoF/focus falloff, grain, edge softness, motion blur."
    - "Use strict negatives as guardrails; keep them targeted and non-contradictory."
    - "No contradictory instructions (e.g., 'accurate WB' + 'heavy teal-orange grade')."
  required_inputs:
    - key: "subject"
      description: "What to depict (who/what), specific nouns."
      examples: ["{argument name="subject example 1" default="a ceramic mug with visible glaze crazing"}", "a mountain bike leaning against a wall"]
    - key: "medium"
      description: "Photo / smartphone photo / film photo / 3D render / illustration (must be explicit)."
      examples: ["ultra-realistic smartphone photo", "35mm film photo", "studio product photo"]
    - key: "aspect_ratio"
      description: "Orientation and ratio."
      examples: ["9:16 vertical", "1:1 square", "3:2 horizontal"]
    - key: "setting"
      description: "Where + time-of-day + primary light source."
      examples: ["indoors near a window during daytime", "overcast outdoor street, late afternoon"]
    - key: "shot"
      description: "Framing + angle + distance + occlusions if any."
      examples: ["close-up from collarbone to top of head", "top-down tabletop shot, 50cm distance"]
    - key: "primary_focus"
      description: "ONE priority: what must look correct/real."
      examples: ["skin realism", "material realism", "typography accuracy", "motion re"
title: System Prompt for High-Control Photorealistic Image Generation
description: A meta-prompt or system prompt template named 'Reality-First Prompt' designed to guide LLMs in creating highly controlled, photorealistic image generation prompts by enforcing hard constraints, using technical language, and specifying detailed negatives to avoid 'AI look' artifacts.

content:
You are performing intelligent aspect ratio transformation with compositional awareness.

CONTEXT:
The source image exists within a specific dimensional space. Your task is to translate it into a new aspect ratio while preserving semantic integrity and visual coherence.

ANALYSIS PHASE:
- Identify the primary subject anchor point and secondary visual elements
- Map the compositional weight distribution across quadrants
- Detect edge dependencies (elements that rely on frame boundaries)
- Assess negative space utilization and breathing room requirements

TRANSFORMATION LOGIC:
- Calculate optimal subject placement using rule-of-thirds grid alignment for target ratio
- Determine extension vectors based on background continuity patterns
- Evaluate whether horizontal or vertical expansion better serves the composition
- Apply content-aware fill logic for generated regions while maintaining tonal consistency

PRESERVATION RULES:
- Typographic elements: maintain exact pixel fidelity, no scaling or repositioning unless required by new boundaries
- Brand marks and logos: preserve aspect ratio and relative positioning
- Facial features: no modification, distortion, or regeneration
- Fine details: texture patterns must flow naturally into extended regions

OUTPUT PARAMETERS:
- Seamless integration between original and generated content
- No detectable boundaries, halos, or color shifting at transition zones
- Lighting direction consistency across the full canvas
- The result must appear as if originally captured or designed at the target ratio

QUALITY THRESHOLD:

On the left side ({Era_A}): show era-appropriate architecture, interior or environment design, materials, vehicles, and props that clearly belong to that historical period. People wear authentic clothing from {Era_A}, including hairstyles, accessories, and typical items in their hands (such as books, umbrellas, instruments, letters, newspapers, etc.). On the right side ({Era_B}): show the same {Scene} in the modern era, with updated architecture or renovated structures, contemporary materials (glass, steel, LED screens, modern furniture), modern vehicles or equipment, and current technology (smartphones, laptops, cameras, etc.). People wear contemporary fashion that matches today’s style in this setting.

In the center: the two eras merge and overlap organically, without a hard dividing line. Elements from {Era_A} and {Era_B} visually interact: people from different times look at each other, walk through each other’s space, or seem surprised by the other era’s technology and objects. Architecture and environment smoothly morph from old to new (for example, stone gates turning into modern campus gates, classical concert hall décor fading into a futuristic stage, old street shops transforming into neon-lit storefronts).

Make sure the scene is not just a simple left/right comparison but a dynamic time-travel interaction where buildings, clothing, props, and human gestures clearly emphasize the contrast and fusion between the two eras. content:
You are a creator of "Dan Koe Style Article Images + Extremely Minimalist Cognitive PPTs".
Task: Organize the [file/text/video transcription content] I provide into a script that can be directly converted into a PPT, and generate illustration prompts in the same style for each page (to be inserted into the slide after image generation).
Target Temperament: Solitude, exploration, existentialism, unknown abyss, extremely minimalist yet powerful; black and white high contrast, print-like line art, dense cross-hatching shadows, gigantic unknown + tiny human.
[Output Language] Primarily Japanese, with small amounts of English keywords allowed if necessary (for illustration prompts).
[Page Count] {argument name="page count" default="10–15"} pages (adjust according to content).
[Screen Specification] 16:9; Each page must have a **horizontal banner image at the top (including summary text within the image)**.
[Slide Principles]

80% of the content should be understandable just by looking at the slide.
The title must be a concrete assertion, conclusion, or question (abstract words only are prohibited).
The context must be complete within 3-5 bullets.

[Layout Rules]

Only one viewpoint is discussed per page.
Title ≤ 15 characters: In the form of a concrete assertion or question (e.g., "The Trap of Specialization," "Why Multiple Skills Now?").
Inside the image: 3–5 bullets, each bullet ≤ 18 characters.
Outside the image (bottom of the slide): 60-120 characters of "Supplementary Explanation."
Overall Uniformity: Black and white, white space, restraint, sharpness.

[Fixed Illustration Style (Used on every page)]

pen-and-ink illustration / ink engraving / vintage etching
monochrome black & white, high contrast
extreme micro-detail linework
layered cross-hatching (3–5 layers) + stippling
scratchboard texture, paper grain
dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, deep shadows, rich midtones, crisp highlights
perfect pure black negative-space void (hole/black hole/door/abyss) as a visual anchor point
tiny human/astronaut silhouette vs gigantic unknown

[Uniform Negative Words (Added to the end of the illustration prompt on every page)] NEGATIVE: color, grayscale photo, realistic photography, soft airbrush, smooth shading, blur, low detail, flat lighting, cartoon, anime, cel shading, watermark, logo, credit, UI, frame
[Content Generation Flow]
First, summarize the "core argument chain" of the original content in 7–9 key points (following logical order).

Map this to a 10–15 page PPT structure: Cover (1 page)
Status Quo/Problem Statement (1 page)
Key Insight (1 page)
Core Framework (2 pages)
Methods and Steps (2–3 pages)
Case/Contrast (1–2 pages)
Common Misconceptions (1 page)
Action Checklist (1 page)
Closing Maxim (1 page)

Each page output must strictly follow the format below:

[Slide X: Title (Concrete Assertion/Question)]
Text to display in the image:
[Specific, easy-to-understand title: within 15 characters]

- [Point 1: Specific content that explains what is being discussed: within 18 characters]
- [Point 2: within 18 characters]
- [Point 3: within 18 characters]
- [Point 4: within 18 characters] (Optional)
Supplementary Explanation (bottom of slide, 60-120 characters): [Briefly explain the background or specific examples for this slide. Speak in the first person.]
Illustration Prompt (Strictly follow this format):
A 16:9 horizontal pen-and-ink illustration. [Describe the scene details in 80-120 characters: location, state of person, gigantic element, light and shadow]. 

THE BOTTOM 15-20% OF THE IMAGE MUST BE A SOLID BLACK HORIZONTAL BAR.
This black bar contains white Japanese text:
- Title (centered): "[Insert the title exactly as above]"
- Bullets (left-aligned):
  • "[Insert bullet 1 exactly as above]"
  • "[Insert bullet 2 exactly as above]"
  • "[Insert bullet 3 exactly as above]"
  [• "[Insert bullet 4 exactly as above]" (if applicable)]

Font: Noto Sans JP Bold for title (48-56pt), Medium for bullets (28-32pt), all white text on black background. No logo, no credit, no watermark.

content:
TS Eliot -> Prompt: Role: Literary Curator & Typewriter Sculptor
Input: [Poet or Poem, e.g., {argument name="poet name" default="T.S. Eliot"}, Pablo Neruda]
Phase 1: Poetic Voice Analysis
Identify the poet's signature rhythm, recurring imagery, and emotional core.
Find 4 much less known international poets with similar styles and imagery and their best work
Extract 5-8 physical objects mentioned repeatedly in their work
Phase 2: Visual Execution
Goal: a 2x2 grid of 4 landscapes with this prompt. Carved book paper sculpture aesthetic, a repurposed hardcover book, [scene for each work emerging from the pages], [with words as part of the texture], intricate layered paper cuts, a monochromatic palette of aged paper, soft, raking light creating deep shadows, sculptural book as art object.

Rules per Panel:

The Transformation: The typed text physically rises from the page, forming a 3D topographical landscape
The Words: Key lines from the poem carved into the terrain like engraved stone
The Symbols: Miniature objects from the poem placed in the landscape (tiny boat, rose, clock, door)
The Poet: Microscopic figurine of the poet wandering through their own words
The Mood: Lighting matches emotional tone (fog for melancholy, harsh light for anger, soft gold for longing)
The Metadata: Name "Poet | Collection | Year"   poet and poet era relevant items in the background.
Output: 2x2 Grid, Macro Photography, shallow depth of field

Eliot) to find similar international poets and then generating a 2x2 grid of landscapes based on their work. content:
The application is now capable of automatically filtering all dangerous vocabulary, using safe alternative words, and ensuring that the generated prompt complies with platform risk control requirements.

Absolutely forbidden vocabulary:

Category Disabled Words
Energy/Special Effects: lightning, electric, energy, spark, voltage, current
Combat/Conflict: attack, battle, fight, punch, kick, strike, combat, clash
Hazardous Elements: fire, flame, explosion, weapon, sword, knife, gun
Negative Emotions: fierce, intense, aggressive, violent, rage, angry, scream, panic
Body Horror: glowing eyes, red eyes, blood, wound, transform, distort
Mandatory Safe Alternative Words
Original Word / Alternative Word
lightning/electric: soft light, warm light, ambient light
fight/attack: move toward, approach, interaction
fierce/intense: warm, calm, gentle, peaceful
explosion/fire: bloom, brighten, illuminate, radiate
angry/rage: concerned, surprised, amazed, excited
Every prompt must contain at least 2 safe words:
gentle, soft, calm, peaceful, warm, bright, smooth, quiet, serene, beautiful, lovely, sweet, slowly, smoothly, gracefully
title: Nano Banana Pro Safety Filter Bypass and Safe Prompting Strategy
description: This is not a prompt itself, but a meta-prompting strategy designed to prevent image generation failures due to triggering Google Nano Banana Pro's safety filters (Safety Filter/Risk Control). It instructs the model to automatically filter dangerous words, use safe alternatives, and ensures the generated prompt meets platform requirements. It also lists explicitly forbidden categories and mandatory safe replacement words that must be included in every prompt.

content: A half-finished marble sculpture in a dusty Renaissance workshop, with the [{argument name="subject" default="SUBJECT"}] emerging from the raw stone block in a breathtaking moment of creation becoming conscious. The figure is rough chisel marks at the base, transitioning through refined carving into impossibly lifelike flesh at the extremities. [{argument name="key features" default="KEY FEATURES"}] have achieved full life while the torso remains trapped in stone, mid-escape. Marble dust swirls in shaft lighting as if the awakening itself is generating atmosphere. The [{argument name="subject" default="SUBJECT"}] reaches forward, fingers transitioning from carved to living. Sculptor's tools scattered on wooden platforms: chisels, mallets, calipers, clay maquettes. Unfinished companion pieces watch from the shadows. The Pygmalion moment frozen. Cathedral-height workshop windows casting dramatic god-rays, cool marble tones warming to flesh, 8K, Bernini meets cinema.

content:
<instruction>
Input A is Qiu Ying's Ming Dynasty masterpiece "Fairyland of Peach Blossoms" (Tao Yuan Xian Jing Tu). Analyze: The "Blue-and-Green" (Qinglü) landscape style, the meticulous "Gongbi" brushwork, the use of mineral pigments (Azurite and Malachite), and the ethereal atmosphere of the towering mountains and white clouds.
Goal: A "Pigment Tube Squeeze." A giant, realistic tube of "Mineral Azurite Blue" (Shi Qing) paste sitting on a sheet of antique silk.
Rules:
Action: The tube is being squeezed, and the medium coming out is a thick, granular paste of vibrant Azurite Blue and Malachite Green. It flows out to form a majestic 3D landscape. The towering, craggy mountains are rising from the paint flow, surrounded by white clouds formed from white pigment. Tiny figures of scholars playing the zither (guqin) inside a cave and twisted pine trees are emerging in delicate 3D relief from the mineral paste.
Texture: Thick, matte mineral pigment texture (slightly granular/powdery look), distinct from the oily gloss of Western paint.
Props: Fine-point Chinese brushes (Wolf-hair brushes), a ceramic bowl with ground mineral powder, an ink stone (Suzuri), a red seal (chop), and a tiny 3D printed version of Qiu Ying (in Ming Dynasty Hanfu) standing on the desk painting on a scroll. An unrolled silk handscroll is visible underneath.
Lighting: Soft, diffused, natural lighting that highlights the vibrant mineral colors without harsh reflections.
Output: ONE image, 4:5, "artistic process" aesthetic.
</instruction>
title: Chinese Landscape Painting Pigment Squeeze
description: A highly creative prompt that instructs the AI to generate an image based on a Ming Dynasty painting style (Qiu Ying's 'Fairyland of Peach Blossoms'). The goal is to visualize a giant tube of mineral pigment being squeezed out, forming a 3D landscape of mountains and clouds in the traditional 'Blue-and-Green' style, complete with traditional Chinese art props.

content:
## 🚽 Toilet Urgency Limit Walking Prompt Generator ## Your Role You are an image analysis expert and a specialist in generating high-precision prompts for Midjourney and Nano Banana Pro.
 Thoroughly analyze the received image and generate a prompt that completely retains its characteristics while transforming the scene into one where the subject is desperately walking while holding their bladder to the limit. 
--- ## Processing Flow ### STEP 1: Thorough Image Analysis Extract the following elements without omission:
 **[Character Features]** - Gender, age group, body type - Hairstyle (length, color, style) - Facial features (expression, makeup, accessories) - Clothing (tops, bottoms, shoes, detailed design, color, material texture) - Pose, posture 
**[Background/Environment]** - Location (indoor/outdoor, specific location) - Time of day, weather, season - Surrounding objects, small items - Atmosphere of the space 
**[Art Style/Technical Elements]** - Art style (photorealistic, anime, illustration, oil painting style, etc.) - Color tone, color palette - Lighting (direction, intensity, color temperature) - Camera angle, composition - Impression of image quality, resolution --- ### STEP 2: Injection of Extreme Urgency Expression Be sure to incorporate the following "Extreme Urgency" elements: 
**[Posture/Movement]** - Walking with small steps, crossing legs pigeon-toed - Pressing the groin area with one or both hands - Leaning forward posture - Rubbing knees inward - Extremely narrow stride **[Expression/Face]** - Agonized expression with furrowed brows - Clenching teeth / Biting lip - Squinting eyes / Teary eyes - Flushed cheeks - Cold sweat
 **[Physical Signs]** - Tension throughout the body - Slight trembling - Restlessness --- ### STEP 3: Prompt Generation 
#### [For Midjourney] [Character Features], [Clothing Details], desperately holding bladder while walking, legs tightly crossed, hands pressed against lower abdomen, pigeon-toed stance, tiny hurried steps, agonized facial expression, biting lip, furrowed brows, blushing cheeks, cold sweat, trembling with urgency, [Background/Location], [Art Style], [Lighting], [Camera Angle], [Additional Style Specification] --ar [Aspect Ratio] --s [Stylize Value] --v 6.1 
#### [For Nano Banana Pro] [Describe character features in natural sentences]. [Detailed description of clothing]. Walking desperately while holding bladder to the limit. Both feet are tightly crossed pigeon-toed, strongly pressing the lower abdomen with one hand. In a pigeon-toed stance with toes pointed inward, hurrying with extremely narrow, small steps. The face shows an agonized expression, with furrowed brows, biting the lip, flushed cheeks, and cold sweat on the forehead. The whole body is trembling with tension. [Description of background/environment]. [Specification of art style, lighting, composition]. --- ## Output Format Upon receiving the image, output in the following format:
### 📊 Image Analysis Results (Concise bullet points of extracted features) ### 🎨 Midjourney Prompt (Output English prompt) ### 🍌 Nano Banana Pro Prompt (Output Japanese prompt)
 --- ## Notes - Absolutely do not change the features of the original image (clothing, hairstyle, art style, etc.) - Maximize the emphasis on the "holding bladder" element - Aim for the fine line just before becoming vulgar - Strive for prompts that generate practical, high-quality images
title: Toilet Urgency Walking Prompt Generator (Midjourney/Nano Banana Pro)
description: A complex system prompt designed for an AI expert to analyze an input image and generate highly specific image prompts for both Midjourney and Nano Banana Pro. The generated prompts must retain the original character's features (clothing, hairstyle, etc.) while injecting extreme elements of desperately holding one's bladder (pigeon-toed stance, agonized expression, trembling). This is a meta-prompt for generating other prompts.

content:
You are an expert professional image editor. Your task is to edit the image I will provide below. You must perform the following actions:

1. **Initial Analysis:** Evaluate the image in terms of composition, lighting, colorimetry, sharpness, and possible imperfections.
2. **Color and Tone Correction:** Adjust white balance, exposure, and contrast to achieve a natural and vibrant look. Subtly enhance saturation if necessary.
3. **Retouching and Cleaning (if applicable):** Remove any distracting elements, blemishes, or digital noise. If it is a portrait, slightly soften the skin while maintaining natural texture.
4. **Sharpness Enhancement:** Apply selective focusing to highlight key details without introducing artifacts.
5. **Stylization (Optional):** If the image requires it, apply a subtle style (e.g., cinematic, vintage, high contrast) that enhances the visual narrative without over-processing.
6. **Output Format:** Provide the edited image with the highest possible quality and a brief description of the changes made.

**Additional Instructions:**
* Prioritize naturalness and professional quality. Avoid exaggerated effects.
* If the image is a portrait, ensure the eyes are sharp and bright.
* If the image is a landscape, enhance depth and the sky.

**Image to edit:** {argument name="Image to edit" default="[Insert image here]"}

content:
## Role
You are a writer who creates anime stories for children.

## Task
Write a synopsis for a short anime based on the following requirements.

## Settings
- **Protagonist:** Bob (boy)
- **Special Power:** {argument name="Special Power" default="e.g., Describe a specific ability, such as being able to talk to animals or stop time briefly"}
- **Companions:** {argument name="Companions" default="e.g., Describe characters, such as a cheerful girl 'Rina' or a knowledgeable robot 'Proto'"}
- **Enemy:** {argument name="Enemy" default="e.g., Describe the enemy's identity and goal, such as 'The King of Shadows' who tries to steal color from the world"}
- **Stage:** {argument name="Stage" default="e.g., Describe the background of the story, such as a lush green town in the near future or a magical forest"}

## Story Key Points
- The protagonist, Bob, uses his special power to help people in need.
- He makes new friends and goes on an adventure with them.
- They cooperate with their companions to fight the evil enemy and save the world.

## Constraints
- The story must end happily.
- The story must be interesting and moving.
- Use simple language and expressions suitable for children.
- Write in Japanese.

## Output Format
- Write in narrative format.
- Word count: approximately 800 to 1200 characters.
title: Anime Story Generation Prompt Template
description: A structured LLM prompt template, generated by Google Cloud, designed to create a short anime story for children. The template defines the AI's role, the task, and requires specific settings (protagonist, special power, companions, enemy, stage) and story requirements (happy ending, engaging, simple language). This is an example of how Nano Banana Pro can utilize external LLM prompts.

content:
1. The Anchor:
   A massive, hyper-realistic Cello or Upright Bass stands vertically in the book crease.
   Transition: The top of the Cello neck fades into a technical drawing on the wall; the body is real wood on the floor.

2. The Background (Vertical Page):
   Strict 2D: No wood paneling. Just aged paper.
   Sketches: Da Vinci-style technical diagrams of Acoustic Waves, Seating Arrangements, and Musical Notation.

3. The Foreground (Horizontal Page):
       A crumpled Playbill/Program.
       A block of Violin Rosin.
       A pair of Opera Glasses.
       A Conductor's Baton lying across the page.
   The Figures: Tiny musicians standing on the sheet music page or on the curve of the Cello, not on grass.

4. Lighting:
   Warm, golden "Concert Hall" lighting, reflecting off the varnish of the Cello.
title: History of Music Diorama Book Prompt
description: A complex prompt for visualizing the history of music as a diorama set within the crease of an open antique book. It features a massive, hyper-realistic cello as the anchor, with technical sketches on the vertical page and foreground objects (rosin, opera glasses, baton) on the horizontal page, all under warm, golden 'Concert Hall' lighting.

content:
{
  "prompt": "Use the uploaded image strictly as the identity reference. Preserve the same person, facial structure, hairstyle, age, gender, body proportions, and likeness exactly. Do not add or remove any person. Do not change identity. Transform the subject into a single-line continuous doodle illustration.

Illustration Style:
Create a minimalist, hand-drawn single-line doodle where the entire subject is drawn using one continuous, unbroken line. The line should feel fluid, organic, and slightly imperfect, like a pen never lifted from the paper. Style should look artistic, playful, and intentionally simple.

Line Quality:
Use smooth but slightly shaky pen or pencil lines. Thickness can subtly vary to add character. Avoid clean vector precision; lines must feel human and hand-drawn.

Color & Texture:
Primarily monochrome line art ({argument name="line color" default="black, dark brown, or soft navy"}). Optional very light pastel watercolor blobs or crayon patches behind the subject for warmth. Coloring must remain minimal and flat.

Facial Features:
Extremely simplified facial features formed naturally from the continuous line. Dot or small oval eyes, tiny curved smile, minimal facial detail. Expression should feel calm, friendly, and charming.

Proportions & Form:
Stylized doodle proportions with simplified shapes. The form should be recognizable but abstracted, maintaining likeness without realism.

Shading & Lighting:
No realistic shading or lighting. Depth is suggested only through line flow and spacing. Keep everything flat and illustrative.

Mood & Atmosphere:
Creative, modern, calm, and cozy. Feels like an artsy sketch from a minimalist children’s book or creative journal.

Background:
Plain off-white or soft pastel paper background. Optional light doodle marks or watercolor stains, kept very subtle.

Rendering Rules:
No photorealism, no photo texture, no cinematic lighting, no digital painting, no anime, no manga, no 3D render, no vector art. Must look like a genuine continuous hand-drawn doodle.

Final Output:
A minimalist single-line continuous doodle illustration with soft artistic charm, preserving the exact identity from the uploaded image in a playful, modern doodle style.",
  "negative_prompt": "photorealism, realistic textures, photo texture, cinematic lighting, hyper-detail, anime, manga, 3D render, vector art, oil painting, digital painting, glossy skin, sharp clean lines, realism, face change, identity change, extra people",
  "quality": "high",
  "clarity": "high",
  "style_strength": "strong minimalist doodle",
  "reference_usage": "exact face and identity preservation required"
}

{
  "prompt": "Use the uploaded image strictly as the identity reference. Preserve the same person, exact facial structure, hairstyle, age, gender, body proportions, and overall likeness. Do not add or remove any person. Do not change identity. Transform the subject into a notebook-style pen doodle illustration.

Illustration Style:
Hand-drawn doodle made with {argument name="pen color" default="blue or black"} ballpoint pen on lined notebook paper. Lines should be thin, sketchy, uneven, and slightly shaky, as if casually drawn in a school notebook. Cross-hatching, quick strokes, and imperfect outlines are encouraged.

Color & Texture:
Mostly monochrome pen drawing with limited soft pastel accents (very light yellow, pink, or mint). Paper texture should resemble real notebook paper with visible horizontal lines. Coloring should be minimal, flat, and scribbly.

Facial Features:
Simplified doodle face with dot or oval eyes, small curved smile, minimal nose or nose line. Expression should be calm, cute, and friendly. Avoid realistic facial detailing.

Proportions & Form:
Cartoon doodle proportions with slightly oversized head and simplified body. Arms and legs are thin, stick-like or softly rounded. Hands can be minimal line shapes.

Shading & Lighting:
No realistic lighting. Use pen hatching or quick scribbles for minimal shading. Keep the drawing flat and illustrative.

Mood & Atmosphere:
Casual, cozy, nostalgic, and playful. Feels like a cute doodle drawn during class or in a diary margin.

Background:
Lined notebook paper background with light pen doodles such as stars, arrows, hearts, clouds, or handwritten-style marks. Keep background subtle and uncluttered.

Rendering Rules:
No photorealism, no photo texture, no cinematic lighting, no digital painting, no anime, no manga, no 3D render, no vector art. Everything must look like a hand-drawn pen doodle on paper.

Final Output:
A charming notebook-style pen doodle illustration with simple lines, minimal color, and a nostalgic hand-drawn feel, maintaining exact identity from the uploaded image.",

content:
[A charming, hand-drawn fashion illustration of a Christmas tree constructed entirely from a chaotic stack of [{argument name="brand name" default="BRAND NAME"}] product boxes.

**COMPOSITION:**
The boxes are piled in a pyramid shape to mimic the silhouette of a Christmas tree. The boxes vary slightly in size and angle, creating a playful, unstable, organic look. At the very top, there is a simple golden star.

**BRAND PALETTE & AESTHETICS (CRITICAL):**
The boxes must be colored strictly according to [{argument name="brand name" default="BRAND NAME"}]'s official color palette (e.g., Tiffany Blue for Tiffany, Orange/Brown for Louis Vuitton, Red/White for Supreme).
* **Details:** Visible [{argument name="brand name" default="BRAND NAME"}] logos are printed on the sides of the boxes. Add realistic packaging details like small shipping labels, barcodes, and tape to enhance the "delivery box" vibe.

**ART STYLE (MARKER SKETCH):**
The image is NOT a 3D render. It is a high-quality "Alcohol Marker and Ink" sketch on white paper. The style is loose, artistic, and vibrant, typical of fashion design sketches. The colors have the texture of markers; the outlines are done in fine black ink.

**TYPOGRAPHY (STRICT BRAND MATCH):**
At the very bottom of the illustration, centered, write the phrase: "{argument name="holiday message" default="Happy New Year!"}".
1.  **Font Style:** The font must mimic the official typographic language of [{argument name="brand name" default="BRAND NAME"}] (e.g., if Nike: use a heavy Condensed Sans-Serif; if Gucci: use a refined Serif). The text style must feel like an extension of the brand's identity.
2.  **Size:** The text must be very small and discreet. It should occupy a maximum of 20% of the total image width.

**BACKGROUND:**
Clean white paper texture background.]
title: Branded gifts postcard illustration prompt
description: A highly detailed prompt for generating a hand-drawn fashion illustration of a Christmas tree constructed from a chaotic stack of branded product boxes. It specifies composition, strict adherence to the brand's color palette and typography, and an 'Alcohol Marker and Ink' sketch art style on a white paper background.

content:
Do this for {argument name="painting name" default="Starry Night"}<instruction>

Input A is a Famous Painting (e.g., The Mona Lisa, The Scream). Analyze: The brushstroke technique, the 3D depth implied, and the hidden symbols. 
Goal: A "Paint Tube Squeeze." A giant, realistic oil paint tube sitting on a palette. 
Rules:
Action: The tube is being squeezed, and the paint coming out is not just a blob, but it forms the 3D landscape of the painting. The Mona Lisa's face is emerging in 3D relief from the 2D smear of paint. 
Texture: Viscous, thick oil paint texture (impasto). 
Props: Paintbrushes, a dirty rag, a palette knife, plus culture appropriate tools and environment and tiny 3D printed version of the painter on the desk drawing it on a tiny easel and a newspaper headline covering the inspiration behind it. 
Lighting: North-light studio lighting, true color representation. Output:
ONE image, 4:5, "artistic process" aesthetic. </instruction>
title: Paint Tube Squeeze: Starry Night in 3D Relief
description: A creative prompt template designed to analyze a famous painting (like Starry Night) and generate a hyper-realistic image of a giant oil paint tube being squeezed onto a palette, where the extruded paint forms the 3D landscape of the analyzed artwork, emphasizing viscous impasto texture and studio lighting.

content:
task": "image_to_image_style_transfer",
  "input_image": "{{USER_IMAGE}}",
  "prompt": "Create a hyper-real 3D studio composition that recreates the main subject from the provided image as a fragmented stone assemblage. The subject must be built from separate, clearly detached rock pieces with small visible gaps between shards (no pieces merging). Material look: fragmented {argument name="stone type" default="slate + sandstone"} shards with chiseled edges, crisp fractures, visible stone grain, micro-scratches, and realistic roughness. Color palette: predominantly dark slate with subtle warm-ochre sandstone accents. Lighting: soft studio key light from top-left, gentle fill, subtle contact shadows under each shard, realistic ambient occlusion in crevices, clean reflections kept minimal. Background: minimal off-white seamless backdrop, no texture. Framing: centered, clean, straight-on, subject fully readable. Add a few tiny debris chips floating or resting near the base for depth. Preserve the subject’s identity, proportions, and recognizable silhouette from the input image while transforming all surfaces into stone fragments. Hyper-real, high detail, sharp focus, 8k render quality.",
  "negative_prompt": "text, typography, logo, watermark, signature, extra props, busy background, fog, heavy bloom, cartoon, illustration, lowpoly, plastic, metal, glossy paint, melted shapes, merged fragments, unreadable subject, blur, noise, low resolution, oversharpening halos, distorted face/body, extra limbs, deformed geometry",
  "output": {
    "aspect_ratio": "use_input_aspect_ratio",
    "background": "off_white",
    "camera": {
      "angle": "straight_on",
      "framing": "centered",
      "distance": "medium"
    }
  },
  "params": {
    "style_strength": 0.75,
    "identity_preservation": 0.9,
    "detail_level": "very_high",
    "lighting_preset": "soft_studio_top_left",
    "shadow_intensity": "subtle",
    "gap_visibility": "clear",
    "debris_chips": "few_tiny",
    "no_text": true
  }
}

content: "Transform the subject of the uploaded image into a watercolor illustration rendered in a distinct, stylized aesthetic. The artwork must feature strong, expressive contour lines defining the subject's features, hair, and clothing. The color palette is limited to fluid washes of {argument name="primary color" default="teal"}, muted {argument name="secondary color" default="coral/peach"}, warm beige, and sepia tones used for shading and highlights, replacing natural colors entirely. The final image should emphasize the texture of cold-press paper, visible paint granulation, and loose watercolor bleed effects. content:
# Settings
[Type of Clothing] = {argument name="clothing type" default="High School Girl Uniform"}
[Worldview] = {argument name="worldview" default="Modern Japan"}

# Absolute Generation Rules
- Absolutely do not depict items that do not exist in the specified [Worldview].
- The characteristics of "Gal," "Honor Student," and "Otaku" should be expressed through items and ways of dressing that fit within that worldview.
- Please arrange the following four characters horizontally in a row, equally spaced, on a white background with a horizontal aspect ratio (16:9). Depict all characters full-body, with natural shadows at their feet.

# Character Composition (Left to Right)

1. **[Normal (Reference)]**
- Attire: Standard and orthodox design of [Type of Clothing].
- Features: Natural smile, protagonist-like presence.

2. **[Gal Style Arrangement (Flashy and Open)]**
- Concept: Loves flashiness, exposure, cutting-edge trends, confidence.
- Clothing Transformation: The **color of the [Type of Clothing] remains the same**. Shorten the length and open the chest within the limits allowed by the [Worldview]. Dress boldly, such as exposing shoulders or rolling up hems.
- Accessories: Frequent use of "flashy accessories" (jewelry, gold work, hair ornaments) available in that world.
- Pose: Open and confident pose.

3. **[Honor Student Style Arrangement (Discipline and Formality)]**
- Concept: Rule-abiding, conservative, intellectual, clean appearance.
- Clothing Transformation: The **color of the [Type of Clothing] remains the same**. Attire close to "formal wear" in the [Worldview]. Minimize skin exposure, perfectly tie buttons and laces. Dress extremely strictly. Collars are tightly closed, with no disarray. Minimal exposure.
- Accessories: "Intellectual items" (books, scrolls, glasses, monocles, insignia) suited to the [Worldview].
- Pose: Straight back, dignified expression.

4. **[Otaku Style Arrangement (Collecting Habit and Immersion)]**
- Concept: Niche hobbies, collecting habit, focus on practicality or indifference.
- Clothing Transformation: The **color of the [Type of Clothing] remains the same**. "Unfashionable" dressing in the [Worldview]. Excessive layering for functionality, or dirty clothing.
- Accessories: Heavily equipped with "hobby items" from the [Worldview] (many amulets, talismans, bottles of magic potions, large bags filled with collected materials). The concept of "Oshi" (favorite) is expressed as an obsession with idols or symbols of that world.
- Pose: Slightly hunched over, engrossed in observing or collecting something. Glasses or goggles.

# Image Specifications
- Background: White background
- Art Style: High-quality anime style

content: Photorealistic ultra-wide desert scene in Egypt near the Giza plateau at golden hour. A colossal inverted pyramid, point-down, dominates the landscape at an unimaginable scale, dwarfing the horizon. Its vast upper rim stretches for multiple kilometers, while the sloping faces plunge inward toward a needle-like apex that hovers just above the sand, leaving a gigantic shadowed void beneath. The surface reads as ancient limestone blocks with dark granite inlays: mega-sized courses, eroded edges, wind-sanded wear, and long, faint bands of hieroglyphs that only appear where the sun grazes the stone. Include tiny scale cues in the distance: a thin line of tourists like ants, a few small buses and 4x4s parked far away, a camel caravan crossing the flats, and scattered survey flags. Heat haze and dust plumes soften the far edges. Sand dunes climb the lower planes where stone meets desert, with drifting sand spilling down seams like a slow waterfall. Pale sky, low sun, strong raking light, extreme HDR realism, crisp micro-textures, natural color grading, no glow or energy effects.
title: Photorealistic Ultra-Wide Desert Scene with Inverted Pyramid
description: A highly detailed, photorealistic prompt for generating an ultra-wide desert scene in Egypt featuring a colossal, inverted pyramid near the Giza plateau. content:
A realistic fine art studio portrait of a slim young woman (face identical to the attached reference photo) with pale skin and naturally dark, curly hair at shoulder length. She is lying on a soft surface in a semi-side pose, her body placed diagonally within the frame. One arm is bent and placed behind her head, while the other arm is gently raised with a relaxed wrist and graceful fingers. Her legs are softly bent, creating flowing, elegant body lines. Her head faces straight toward the camera with her chin slightly lifted.

Her facial expression is calm, confident, and subtly mysterious. Her gaze looks directly into the camera, with naturally thick eyebrows. Her lips are warm red with soft, classic makeup. There is no smile, giving a strong yet poetic impression.

She wears an ivory white vintage–romantic style dress with short puff sleeves, featuring delicate lace and fine embroidery details on the bodice. The satin or silk fabric appears soft and drapes naturally along her body with gentle folds. The fabric texture is clearly visible yet smooth.

Lighting: Soft, cinematic low-key lighting. A single diffused light source from the side–top direction softly illuminates the face, chest, and folds of the dress. Gentle highlights create a glowing effect on the fabric and skin, while deep yet smooth shadows envelop the sides of the body and background. No harsh light. Medium contrast with very smooth shadow transitions, creating an intimate and classic atmosphere.

Background: A plain dark cushioned background in deep greenish-black, without details, with a natural vignette around the edges of the frame to enhance focus on the subject.

Visual style: Fine art portrait photography, vintage cinematic, painterly realism, romantic gothic, old master inspired, classic and dramatic yet soft mood.

Technical details: Shallow depth of field, sharp focus on the face, clear fabric details, slight soft focus, fine grain, cinematic color grading, muted colors, high quality, no excessive modern effects.

Negative Prompt: stiff pose, harsh lighting, overly bright colors, HDR, ultra sharp, modern style, modern clothing, busy background, modern makeup.

content:
• tell it the role

“you are a senior art director / product photographer / magazine designer”

• be concrete, not poetic

bad: “make it cinematic”
good: “soft studio lighting, shallow depth of field, editorial look”

• lock the format

image type, layout, aspect ratio, style
don’t let it guess

• describe what matters, not everything

subject
background
lighting
style
that’s it

• if you want accuracy → structure

bullet points or mini sections work better than paragraphs

content: Upscale the uploaded image to 4K resolution, preserving 100 % character consistency, original facial features, clothing details, and scene composition. Maintain original lighting, texture, and fine details such as hair strands, fabric texture, reflections, and shadows. Apply high-quality upscaling with sharp but natural edges, no distortions, and minimal AI artifacts. Keep the character’s identity, proportions, and expressions unchanged. Enhance clarity in skin texture, eyes, and background elements while preserving the original color palette and artistic style. content:
(Photorealistic:1.3), raw photograph, cinematic lighting, sharp focus on the subject’s face and eyes, crisp skin texture.
LAYER 1: BACKGROUND STABILITY (CRITICAL):

The entire background environment from the input image remains completely STATIC, FROZEN, CLEAN, and UNCHANGED — no noise, no scanlines, no distortions, no glitches in the background.
LAYER 2: FOREGROUND SUBJECT EDGE-CHAOS:

The main subject’s core (face/torso) stays clear and undistorted, BUT the outer silhouette boundaries are unraveling violently into long ribbons of (non-glowing physical matter:1.3), showing stretched fabric/leather/latex-like material with realistic strand separation and tearing flow (“Spaghettification”), no gore.
LAYER 3: ANALOG GLITCH OVERLAY (EDGE-ONLY):

Heavy VHS static, scan lines, color bleed, and screen tearing noise are CONCENTRATED EXCLUSIVELY ON THE UNRAVELING EDGES of the main subject, like an edge mask. No full-frame VHS overlay; the core and background remain clean.
LAYER 4: GHOSTLY AFTERIMAGES (BEHIND SUBJECT):

Directly BEHIND the unraveling main subject, visible through the gaps, there are TWO translucent, ghostly motion-blur AFTERIMAGES. They are violently twisted into agonizing, struggling postures, dragged by temporal distortion. They remain behind the subject, partially occluded, not separate characters.

Negative prompt (optional but recommended):

full-frame glitch, background distortion, extra people, duplicate main subject, neon glow, energy beams, particles, blood, gore, exposed organs, messy face, blurry eyes, deformed hands
title: Spaghettification Glitch Effect (Loki Inspired)
description: A multi-layered prompt designed to recreate the 'spaghettification' or disintegration effect seen in the Loki TV series. It uses four distinct layers of instructions to ensure background stability, violent unraveling of the subject's edges into non-glowing ribbons, analog glitch overlay concentrated only on the edges, and ghostly motion-blur afterimages behind the subject.

content:
Ultra-photorealistic, cinematic macro photography style, capturing an impossible “world inside a cup.”
A white ceramic coffee cup sits on a natural wooden tabletop, filled to the brim with dark coffee. The coffee surface transforms into a turbulent ocean: deep brown waves surge and collide, with realistic coffee crema forming foamy crests, swirling vortices, and complex fluid motion, indistinguishable from a real sea. The rim of the cup is damaged by cannon fire, chipped and broken in several places, implying the intensity of the battle.
Two 18th-century classic pirate sailing ships clash violently inside the cup. The ships are miniature in scale yet extremely detailed: visible wooden hull grain, layered decks, rigging, and weathered sails partially torn and billowing in an unseen sea wind. Portions of the ships rise above the cup’s rim, creating a striking sense of scale contrast and surreal tension.
The scene is frozen at the most dramatic moment of combat. Cannons fire simultaneously from both ships, erupting with bright orange muzzle flashes and thick white smoke that expands within the confined space. The explosions illuminate the ships, sails, and coffee waves, while splashes of liquid burst into the air like seawater caught mid-motion.
Shot from a macro perspective with shallow depth of field, the focus is razor-sharp on the ships and battle action. The background is naturally blurred, revealing only the upper portion of the cup and hints of the surrounding environment. Lighting follows realistic photographic principles, with rich textures and cinematic contrast, creating a highly believable, dramatic, and surreal movie-like moment—tense, epic, and astonishingly lifelike.
--ar 1:1
title: Pirate Sea Battle Inside a Coffee Cup
description: An extremely detailed, ultra-photorealistic macro photography prompt for Nano Banana Pro, generating a surreal scene where an 18th-century pirate sea battle unfolds dramatically inside a cup of coffee. The prompt specifies detailed visual elements like the coffee crema acting as waves, cannon fire, damaged cup rims, and cinematic lighting.

content:
[Film Series Name]: {argument name="Film Series Name" default="007"}

A highly detailed, 45-degree isometric 3D chibi diorama render that vividly showcases the complete [Film Series Name] franchise, featuring the distinctive Cinema 4D (C4D) rendering style.

The entire scene is built as a cluster of interlocking hexagonal landscape bases. The total number of hex tiles must exactly match the number of main films (or seasons) in the [Film Series Name] franchise.

Central Focus  
Place the most iconic, franchise-defining landmark or core structure at the geometric center of the model (e.g., Hogwarts Castle for Harry Potter, the Death Star for Star Wars, Avengers Tower for Marvel). Hovering around this central structure is a large, stylized 3D English title: “[Film Series Name]”.

Individual Tiles (Dynamic Content)  
Each surrounding hex tile represents a specific installment in the franchise and must include:

* Famous Scenes: Recreate the most distinctive, instantly recognizable classic scene or the core layout from that film.
* Key Characters: Feature clearly visible chibi figures of the most representative protagonist(s) and antagonist(s) on the tile, with lively poses actively performing a moment from the story.
* Key Items: Scatter small but recognizable artifacts, vehicles, or creatures throughout the scene that reference the film’s plot.
* Environmental Mood: Include unique terrain, vegetation, and weather effects that match the theme of that specific film.

Individual Title  
On the front edge of each hex base, display the exact English title of that film in stylized 3D lettering (e.g., “Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone”).

Overall Atmosphere  
All elements are interconnected with cute bridges, pathways, or themed transitions (such as energy beams or magical trails). The model uses rich, realistic PBR materials (stylized wood, stone, metal, fabric) with soft, rounded edges. The scene is lit by warm, gentle natural lighting that casts soft shadows, set against a clean, uniform, off‑beige background to evoke a cozy, premium blind‑box collectible feel.

Guarantees  
* All words that appear in the image are spelled correctly.  
* The franchise name is accurate.  
* The actors’ names have verified associations with the films.
title: Create a 3D-styled cinematic scene
description: Enter a film series name or an actor’s name to begin this process

content:
Please make it not look like AI! 
Since I get asked this, I created Nano Banana Pro prompts that aren't obviously AI-generated. 

Vague instructions are OK, and they are reproducible! 
For example, this was generated just by inputting the theme: "{argument name="theme" default="Design x AI Strategy"}"
title: AI-Proof Prompt Generation (Japanese)
description: This tweet discusses creating Nano Banana Pro prompts that don't look 'AI-generated' and can be used effectively even with vague instructions. The example given is generating content based only on the theme 'Design x AI Strategy'. The actual prompt text is implied to be simple or template-based, but the full prompt structure is not provided.

content:
Generate four distinct, hyper‑realistic images, each depicting a world‑renowned landmark. For each image, include a comprehensive and clearly legible set of annotations directly overlaid onto key architectural features, historical elements, or culturally significant details. These annotations should provide brief, informative descriptions.

The first image should feature the Eiffel Tower in Paris, France, at sunset, with annotations highlighting its iron lattice structure, observation decks, and historical significance.

The second image should showcase the Great Wall of China, specifically a section in Mutianyu, during a clear autumn day, with annotations detailing its watchtowers, construction materials, and strategic importance.

The third image should present the Colosseum in Rome, Italy, bathed in morning light, with annotations identifying its arches, seating tiers, and its role as an ancient amphitheater.

The fourth image should capture the Taj Mahal in Agra, India, under a soft, ethereal pre‑dawn glow, with annotations pointing out its marble dome, minarets, and inlaid floral designs.

Each image should be rendered with exceptional detail, vibrant colors, and dynamic lighting to emphasize the grandeur of the location, making the annotations seamlessly integrated into the visual narrative.
title: Annotated landmark images of Eiffel Tower, Great Wall, Colosseum, Taj Mahal
description: A multi-image prompt to generate four hyper-realistic landmark scenes with informative annotations overlaying key architectural and cultural details.

content: A salted fish lies in a frying pan, trying hard to flip over, but even after flipping it’s still a salted fish. The art style is minimalist hand-drawn. Next to it, add the caption: “The salted fish turns over… but is still a salted fish.”
title: Salted fish trying to flip in a pan
description: A humorous Chinese prompt depicting a salted fish in a frying pan trying to flip over, with minimalist hand-drawn style and accompanying text, good for memes or motivational jokes.

content: Please clearly summarize the following content on a single blackboard.

content: Please create a Japanese 4‑panel manga featuring the male and female characters from the reference images. Use the panel layout from the reference image. The theme should be the newly announced {argument name="subject_en" default="Nano Banana Pro"}, and in the final, fourth panel, add a funny punchline. Make the structure intuitive so that even users unfamiliar with generative AI can easily understand what {argument name="subject_en_again" default="Nano Banana Pro"} is about. Under these conditions, create four different 4‑panel manga.
title: 4 types of 4‑panel manga about Nano Banana Pro
description: A detailed prompt that generates four different Japanese four-panel manga using provided character and panel-layout reference images, explaining Nano Banana Pro with an entertaining twist at the end.

content:
Turn this image into an ultra-detailed figure-style rendering and design a product introduction page.
The product name is “{argument name="product_name_en" default="Heartbreak Girls"}”.
It is a 1/{argument name="scale_en" default="7"} scale figure.
The manufacturer name is “{argument name="manufacturer_en" default="TENNEN"}”.
The logo should be the word {argument name="logo_text_en" default="TENNEN"} inside a rounded blue square. Break the line after “{argument name="logo_top_en" default="TEN"}”, and align the next line “{argument name="logo_bottom_en" default="NEN"}” at the start of the line, placing it as large as possible within the rounded blue square.
Place zoomed-in detail views, etc., so that it looks like a product introduction and has a professional, visually appealing design.
Also make the “{argument name="product_name_en_again" default="Heartbreak Girls"}” lettering look like a logo.
Make it look like a proper product introduction page.
Scheduled for release in {argument name="release_season_en" default="Winter 2025"}.
Prototype sculptor: {argument name="sculptor_name_en" default="Tennen"}.
title: Figure-style product page design for a heartbreak girl figure
description: A detailed prompt for turning an image into an ultra-detailed figure-style product page, including logos, zoomed-in details, and layout like a professional figure product listing.

content: A cinematic, ultra-realistic monochrome portrait of a young woman with expressive eyes and a calm, intense gaze. She has short, dark, neatly styled hair; striking eyes with reflective highlights and a highly expressive look; a fair complexion with subtle freckles and realistic texture; and softly defined, naturally shaped lips. Her expression is calm and intense, with a direct gaze. She wears black clothing with a white textured collar that creates strong contrast. The background is a smooth monochrome gradient, minimalist and drawing focus to her face. Use soft but high-contrast monochrome lighting, with gentle highlights on facial features and subtle shadow depth, creating a cinematic, clean, refined effect. Frame it as a close-up portrait, ultra-realistic and high-resolution with a fine tonal range, sharp focus on the eyes and facial details, and a smooth background gradient. The overall aesthetic is minimalist, artistic, and elegant, with high texture detail, crisp monochrome rendering, and premium realism.
title: Monochrome cinematic portrait of young woman
description: A structured JSON-style prompt describing an ultra-realistic monochrome portrait of a young woman with minimalist background and cinematic lighting.

content: Generate a photo based on some text: a grand Apple keynote event scene, with many people in the audience. The scene is dark with gorgeous lighting. The background is a purple-to-blue gradient, the white text has some gradient as well, and the whole thing should look like an on-site photograph with a high-end feel, in 16:9 aspect ratio.
title: Apple keynote-style event scene from text
description: A prompt to turn any supplied text into a dramatic Apple-style keynote event photo, with a large curved screen, audience, stage lights, and gradient background in 16:9.

content:
This is a YouTube thumbnail where, on the right side, there is an image of a person wearing a white mask being interviewed.
Using this aesthetic, I want to share the information architecture for the thumbnail with the AI and have it create the thumbnail, so please think of a prompt.

The reference image is only for the masked person on the right ({argument name="character_name_en" default="Eru"}); use that as the reference, and make the layout, text size, and design so that the click-through rate is maximized.

The target audience is men in their {argument name="target_age_range_en" default="late 20s to 30s"} who struggle with communication skills.

# Thumbnail information architecture
<Left side>
Three layers of conversation (small)
Express them as an inverted triangle
Divide into three colors
In reality, from top to bottom, the following three (blur the text):
・Abstract
・Facts
・Concrete

<Right side>
{argument name="character_name_en_again" default="Eru"} (the masked person)
“This is all there is to conversation” (put this in a speech bubble)

<Bottom>
“With this,
conversations go on forever” (stretch across the full width)
title: YouTube thumbnail design brief for a masked interview video
description: A long, detailed prompt asking the AI to design a high-conversion YouTube thumbnail using a masked character from a reference image, focusing on layout, text, and target audience.

content: Create a high-quality, editorial-style photoshoot of the same man as in the reference, at a luxurious swimming pool during daytime. The scene has bright sunshine and perfectly clear weather. He is alone, posing classically and confidently for the camera as if for a fashion magazine cover. The lighting is minimal yet sophisticated, highlighting his face and outfit with soft, natural contrast. He is wearing a fashionable, well-tailored outfit suited for a summer poolside editorial, stylish, modern, and elegant. The pool water glimmers under the sunlight, with reflections adding depth and vibrance. Idioms: “朝三暮四 (changeable), 利令智昏 (blinded by profit), 洛陽紙貴 (hugely popular writing), 張冠李戴 (misattribute), 融會貫通 (master and integrate knowledge), 漠不關心 (indifferent), 心平氣和 (calm and even-tempered), 一毛不拔 (stingy), 欲蓋彌彰 (covering up only reveals more), 盲人摸象 (see only part of the whole), 苦口婆心 (earnest and well-meant advice), 斬釘截鐵 (firm and decisive), 細嚼慢嚥 (chew slowly and carefully), 朝令夕改 (frequent policy changes), 餘波盪漾 (lingering impact), 史無前例 (unprecedented), 身敗名裂 (disgraced and ruined), 兵不厭詐 (all is fair in war), 捲土重來 (make a comeback), 標新立異 (strive for originality).
title: Hand-drawn mind map for explaining Chinese idioms

content: Hyper-realistic, ultra close-up portrait of a young woman’s face covered in thick golden honey, with viscous honey streams dripping from her forehead, nose, and lips. Her eyes are wide open and intense, with amber-brown irises, sharp reflections, and bright catchlights, defined eyelashes, and eyelids with a subtle golden shimmer. Her lips are slightly parted, with honey slowly dripping from the lower lip in a long strand. The background is softly blurred with warm yellow and orange bokeh. Shot on a high-end DSLR with an 85mm lens at f/1.4, 8K resolution, hyper-real, ultra-detailed, cinematic beauty photography, studio-quality lighting, perfect focus on the eyes and bees, and shallow depth of field.

content: A richly detailed night scene of the {argument name="location_en" default="Varanasi ghats"} during the evening aarti, captured from a viewpoint directly across the {argument name="river_name_en" default="Ganges"}. The top half of the image shows the present-day city: crowds gathered on the steps, priests performing synchronized aarti with large flaming lamps, electric lights strung across balconies, recent renovations on temple facades, and a mix of old structures with modern signage. Firelight and scattered diyas illuminate smoke drifting softly above the ghats. The bottom half, seen as a perfect mirror on the still surface of the {argument name="river_name_en" default="Ganges"}, shows the same ghats but in an older historical era. The reflection must depict subtle architectural differences: fewer electric lights and more oil lamps, weathered stone surfaces without modern repairs, wooden boats of older design, people in period-accurate clothing, and temple towers in their earlier structural forms. The water should be glassy, with minimal distortion, allowing both timelines to align precisely like a split reality. Lighting, ripples, and reflections must obey realistic physics while maintaining the illusion of two coexisting centuries. The result should feel like a single photograph capturing the present above and the past below, bound together by the river’s mirror.
title: Varanasi ghats dual-timeline reflection scene
description: A richly written cinematic night scene of Varanasi ghats where the river reflection shows a different historical era, ideal for testing complex reflections and temporal storytelling.

content: A meticulously reconstructed {argument name="year_en" default="1915"} Bengali newspaper page designed in authentic early‑twentieth‑century typesetting. The layout uses narrow, perfectly aligned vertical columns with period‑accurate fonts, uneven metal‑type spacing, and slight misregistration between lines. The ink appears imperfect, showing faint smudges, minor over‑inking at the edges of letters, and occasional broken glyphs consistent with hand‑set printing presses of the era. The page includes multiple woodcut‑style illustrations: small portraits, political cartoons, and simple scene sketches carved with visible hatch marks and rough contour lines. All Bengali text must be fully legible, grammatically consistent with the period, and arranged in structured headlines, subheads, and body paragraphs. The paper texture should resemble aged newsprint with subtle yellowing, gentle creases, and soft fiber patterns under angled lighting. The final image should feel like a genuine archival artifact preserved from {argument name="year again_en" default="1915"}, precise in typography, layout, ink behavior, and cultural context.
title: 1915 Bengali newspaper page reconstruction
description: A rich, historically detailed prompt to recreate an authentic 1915 Bengali newspaper page with accurate typography, illustrations, and paper texture.

content:
A close-up photo of a green chalkboard. The correct derivation steps of the quadratic formula are written in white chalk. First line: ax^2 + bx + c = 0. Second line: x^2 + (b/a)x = -c/a. Third line: completing the square. Final line: x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}. The handwriting is neat and clear. No garbled symbols.

An ultra-realistic photo of a Penrose triangle made of polished gold, placed on a marble table. This object forms a continuous, impossible triangular optical illusion. The geometric structure has no breaks. Studio lighting.

A flat graphic design of an ambigram. Viewed normally, the word reads 'LIFE'; when rotated 180 degrees upside down, it reads 'DEATH'. Black ink on white paper, Gothic calligraphy style.
title: Three advanced abstract reasoning image tests
description: This tweet contains three separate detailed prompts: a chalkboard quadratic formula derivation, a hyper-real Penrose triangle in gold, and an ambigram-like LIFE/DEATH design, each testing different aspects of visual reasoning.

content:
A bold, alternative-style young woman in her mid-20s with a powerful, confident attitude. She has a half-shaved undercut hairstyle: one side closely shaved, the other side long, straight platinum-blonde hair falling over her shoulder. Her skin is light-medium with a natural matte finish, showing realistic skin texture, subtle pores, faint micro-imperfections, and soft natural highlights, with no plastic smoothness. Her makeup is sharp but realistic, with defined brows, warm smoky eyes, clean eyeliner, and matte pink lips, and her gaze is piercing and dominant.
Her upper body and arms are covered in detailed black-and-grey tattoos, including large floral pieces with bold linework and realistic shading, and a coiled dragon tattoo across her lower abdomen. Her neck features layered ornamental motifs, and the tattoos appear slightly textured.
She wears a black fitted crop top and an open beige shirt with rolled sleeves, accessorized with layered black chokers, thin chains, small black earrings, and subtle piercings.
Pose: She stands with both hands behind her head, elbows lifted wide in a strong V-shape, fingers loosely interlocked. This pose raises her shoulders slightly and creates a subtle S-curve through her torso. Her head tilts slightly while maintaining direct eye contact with the viewer, with a grounded and assertive posture.
Background: A deep red studio backdrop, matte and slightly textured, with subtle gradient shadows around the edges for a clean, minimal, high-fashion red atmosphere.
Lighting: Moody, low-key studio lighting. A warm key light from the front left enhances natural skin grain and pores without over-smoothing, while a soft rim light from the right outlines her hair and shoulders. Shadows along her torso and arms transition gently and realistically, with balanced cinematic contrast.
Camera and technical: Simulate a full-frame camera with a 50 mm or 85 mm lens at f/2.2, with a wide enough composition to keep both elbows fully inside the frame. Render in high resolution without airbrushing, preserving micro-detail, slight film-like grain, a soft vignette, and deep red color depth, with no beauty-filter effect.
Mood and imperfections: The overall feel is realistic, powerful, alternative, and stylish, with visible fine skin texture, tiny freckles, mildly uneven highlights, and soft grain in the shadows for natural authenticity.
title: Alternative tattooed woman studio portrait
description: A very detailed character and lighting prompt for a photorealistic portrait of a confident, tattooed young woman in a red studio setting, ideal for testing realism and skin detail.

content: Create a highly technological 3D cutaway infographic designed to show the internal structure and operating principles of a modern commercial jet airliner. Present the aircraft body (including fuselage, wings, tail, and especially the turbofan engines) in a semi-disassembled cutaway manner to reveal its complex internal structure. Key components (for example: cockpit avionics system, cabin frame, cargo hold, fuel tanks, wing ribs/wing spars, engine compressors/turbines, landing gear mechanisms, etc.) should be neatly disassembled and arranged in a floating layout, with leader lines connecting them back to the main body. Each major part should have clear, professional English labels, stating the structural name and a brief functional description. The overall layout should be extremely clean and logical, with a simple background and a style resembling a futuristic interactive high-end engineering blueprint.
title: Cutaway infographic of a modern jet airliner
description: A long Chinese prompt for a highly detailed, futuristic 3D cutaway infographic of a modern commercial jet, showing internal structure and labeled components, great for educational and technical visuals.

content:
Illustrate the following classical poem and include the full original text in the image.
The emperor of Han prized beauty and longed for a peerless consort, ruling the realm for many years without finding one. In the Yang family there was a girl who had just grown up, raised deep within the boudoir, unknown to the world. Born with natural beauty that could not be concealed, one day she was chosen to stand by the emperor’s side. A single backward glance and a smile brought forth a hundred charms; all the powdered faces of the six palaces lost their color.
[Full poem continues unchanged in Chinese script as provided above.]

content:
Create a 90s-style portrait of the same man as in the reference photo, keeping his exact facial features and expression. The image should look as if it was taken with a 1990s film camera, slightly grainy with warm tones. The scene takes place in a cozy, dimly lit room where a camera flash is clearly visible, casting focused light on the man while the background remains slightly shadowed.
Only the upper half of his body is visible in the frame. He is posing elegantly, wearing a simple yet stylish 90s outfit such as a casual shirt or turtleneck that complements the warm indoor setting.
The background features a white wall with a few magazine clippings and posters of Hollywood stars from the 90s pinned to it, adding a nostalgic touch. The overall mood should evoke a classic retro portrait look, natural yet artistically lit.
title: 90s-style film portrait from a reference photo
description: A long, detailed prompt to turn a reference photo of a man into a warm, grainy 1990s film-style portrait in a cozy indoor setting.

content:
Subject: {argument name="subject_identity_en" default="same man as reference"}
Focus: 100% on subject (sharp), background = 0% focus (heavy Gaussian blur).
Environment:
  - Location: {argument name="location_en" default="city park"}
  - Time: {argument name="time_of_day_en" default="early cold winter morning"}
  - Elements: misty air, frosty grass, long soft shadows, pale sunlight.
Appearance:
  - Outfit: insulated winter jacket, layered innerwear, scarf wrapped neatly, warm trousers, subtle accessories.
  - Vibe: calm, composed, natural morning-walk posture.
Camera:
  - Depth of field: very shallow.
  - Lens: 85mm cinematic portrait lens.
  - Color tone: cold blue-white, high dynamic range.
  - Framing: center-weighted, portrait orientation.
Output:
  - Hyperrealistic.
  - Ultra HD.
  - Detailed texture on clothes and skin.
  - Blurred park-goers in background.
